HOME.USEFUL_LINKS_I: Access more information through these sources.

USER.DELETE_MY_DATA_MSG: The action is irreversible! Please, if you are sure, confirm the operation by typing "{{confirmKey}}" here below:
USER.COMPLETE_PROFILE_TO_REGISTER_TO_EVENT: Complete the profile above to register to the event
USER.YOU_ARE_NOT_REGISTERED: You are not registered to the event
USER.REGISTER_TO_EVENT: Tap here to register for the event
USER.YOU_ARE_REGISTERED_BUT_NO_SPOT: You are registered, but don't have a spot yet
USER.YOU_HAVE_A_SPOT_BUT_NO_PROOF_PAYMENT: Congratulations, you have a spot! Please upload your proof of payment to confirm your participation
USER.YOU_HAVE_SPOT_PROOF_BUT_NO_CONFIRM: Your proof of payment will soon be checked
USER.YOU_ARE_CONFIRMED: Your participation to the event has been confirmed. Enjoy!
USER.ACCEPT_TC: I read and I agree with the event's Terms and Conditions
USER.ACCEPT_COC: I read and I agree with the event's Code of Conduct

SPOTS.RELEASE_SPOT_I: These spots will be unassigned from the user
SPOTS.CONFIRM_PAYMENT_AND_SPOT_I: The payment will be marked as paid and the user assigned (if any) will receive a notification.

USERS.CONFIRM_SPOT_PAYMENT_I: The payment will be marked as paid and the user's participation will be confirmed. The user will receive a notification.
USERS.MANAGE_PERMISSIONS_ADMIN_NOTE: Note: by assigning the Administrator permissions, the user will automatically acquire all the other permissions.
USERS.DOWNLOAD_FILTERED_USERS: Download filtered users in a spreadsheet

MANAGE.USERS_AND_REGISTRATIONS_I: Manage the users and everything related to the event registrations.
MANAGE.EMAIL_TEMPLATES_I: Set the templates for the following notification emails.

EMAIL_TEMPLATES_TYPES.SPOT_ASSIGNED: A spot has been assigned to a user
EMAIL_TEMPLATES_TYPES.REGISTRATION_CONFIRMED: A user's spot has been paid and confirmed
EMAIL_TEMPLATES_TYPES.SPOT_TRANSFERRED: A user's spot has been transferred to another user
EMAIL_TEMPLATES_TYPES.SPOT_RELEASED: A user has been released from his spot

MANAGE.DOCUMENT_TEMPLATES_I: Set the templates for the following documents.

DOCUMENT_TEMPLATES_TYPES.INVOICE: The invoice for user spot payment

MANAGE.CONTENTS_I: Create and organise the contents of the event.
MANAGE.REGISTRATIONS_OPTIONS_I: Open/close the registrations and other options.
MANAGE.ALLOW_COUNTRY_LEADER_ASSIGN_SPOT: Allow country leaders to assign spots
MANAGE.REGISTRATION_FORM_I: Add, manage and remove the fields requested during the registration.
MANAGE.EVENT_SPOTS_I: Decide the spot types available for this event.
MANAGE.EVENT_SPOTS_II: It is adviced NOT to change the spot types in any way during the registrations.

EMAIL_TEMPLATE.HTML_I: Set an HTML template for the email to send.
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.VARIABLES_ALLOWED: The template can contain the following variables:
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: Subject
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.BAD_TEMPLATE: The template seems to have some problems. Please check its correctness.
EMAIL_TEMPLATE.TEST_TEMPLATE_I: A test email with the template currently active will be sent to your email address.

VARIABLES.USER: The full name of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.COUNTRY: The country of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SECTION: The section of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SPOT_TYPE: The spot type of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SPOT_ID: The spot ID (reference) of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.PRICE: The price of the spot for the user target of the notification

DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE.HTML_I: Set an HTML template to serve as the base for the PDF document.
DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE.VARIABLES_ALLOWED: The template can contain the following variables:
DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE.BAD_TEMPLATE: The template seems to have some problems. Please check its correctness.
DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE.TEST_TEMPLATE_I: A test document with the template currently active will be downloaded to your device.

VARIABLES.USER: The full name of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.COUNTRY: The country of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SECTION: The section of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SPOT_TYPE: The spot type of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.SPOT_ID: The spot ID (reference) of the user target of the notification
VARIABLES.PRICE: The price of the spot for the user target of the notification

MANAGE.USEFUL_LINKS_I: Manage the links you want to make available to all users for quick access.

STRIPE.DISCLAIMER_I: In order for your spot to be paid for and subsequently validated by the organization, we kindly ask you to save the reference below and insert it, as it is, on the corresponding field in the Stripe payment platform. Price may increase to cover for Stripe's payment processing fees.
